title: Dog Style 1
description: After their fourth time together, Teru and Miki finally have sex good enough to melt them both. However, they're still stuck in a weird place... more than friends with benefits, but not quite lovers. But now Miki's friend Kashiwa is demanding a meeting. What? Kashiwa's showing interest, and he wants a kiss...? What a dog!
author: Modoru Motoni
